summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3522, for the improvement of North Broadway from East Newton Street to the south line of Broadway 2nd Addition, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43601 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
